guide.introduction: The Sharpwriter pencil is that one-time-use mechanical pencil that pretty much everyone has used before. So we probably all know that it is very skinny and can hurt your hand if you write with it for long periods of time. I am going to show you a quick and easy way to make a gripper for this pencil.
guide.introduction_rendered: The Sharpwriter pencil is that one-time-use mechanical pencil that pretty much everyone has used before. So we probably all know that it is very skinny and can hurt your hand if you write with it for long periods of time. I am going to show you a quick and easy way to make a gripper for this pencil.

lines.text: The tube will not normally fit over the pencil. To make it more pliable, dip a 1-inch section of hose into the hot water. I didn't want to get burned so I got it out with tongs.
lines.text_raw: The tube will not normally fit over the pencil. To make it more pliable, dip a 1-inch section of hose into the hot water. I didn't want to get burned so I got it out with tongs.

lines.text: Then muscle the piece of tube over the pencil.
lines.text_raw: Then muscle the piece of tube over the pencil.

lines.text: Dip in the hot water if it starts to get hard again.
lines.text_raw: Dip in the hot water if it starts to get hard again.

lines.text: And that's it! Once it cools it will never come off so you don't need to glue it on.
lines.text_raw: And that's it! Once it cools it will never come off so you don't need to glue it on.

lines.text: And that's how you make a cheap gripper for your pencil!
lines.text_raw: And that's how you make a cheap gripper for your pencil!

guide.summary: I love the Sharpwriter pencil from Paper Mate, but it's very skinny and hurts my hands after writing a lot. I could buy a gripper but where is the fun in that? So I made one.
guide.title: Make a Gripper for Sharpwriter Pencil
